title: Authenticating forever
body: Can someone help me please I haven't been able to play for 2 days it just says authenticating and doesn't log me in. Also I can't connect to the riot website on my PC or even this website I'm currently using my phone to write this

replies.body: I have the same problem but the client logs me in eventually. beside that the client is crashing so many times now

I seem to be having the same problem... came home from being gone for a week. Trying to load up a damn game of LoL. And now this crap... I was, however, able to log in to the riot website on my PC.

Also. Just tried restarting PC and running the client as administrator. No luck

I'm not seeing any widespread NA server issues right now, but there might have been a slight hiccup with the login servers around the time you were trying to sign in. If you're still having problems getting signed in, do a quick checkup on your [**network settings**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) and let me know if that's able to help.
